name: DeskTop Pets
description:
VERSION: 1.1.0.0

---------- GAME INFO ----------

Sleep icon: Sleep for 10 min

Clean icon: Clean unicorn poop

Resize, Change, and Fullscreen the window all you want!

---------- 1.1 NEW FEATURES ----------

"L" : Resize window back to default

New pet: Turtle!

Background color changes depending on the pet

---------- FUTURE ADDITIONS  ----------

A Save/Load option so you don't lose progress with your pets,

More pets,

More icons,

A shop/Currency system,

And a good game!

This is my first time executing a game as an installer, so there may be some bugs/glitches.
